comments.body: Do we have a test coverage for this change? The newly added test case seems to pass without this change. If this is required, please add a test coverage for this change.

Just to be consistent with the logic of `BasicStatsPlanVisitor`. The result will not change:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5399861/122626418-12ff4080-d0dd-11eb-841a-49c356b8338e.png)
